short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unofficial Amazon US product search and shopping extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Amazon US product search extension will simplify your Amazon shopping experience! 
✔️Our extension uses 'Specialized Google Search Engine' to search across the Amazon website and returns the perfect product matching with your search term.
✔️You save time by directly searching in chrome search bar(Omnibox). Or simply click on extension icon to initiate Amazon product search instantly. 
✔️So you don't have to login to Amazon site again and again. 
✔️You don't have to go through sponsored Amazon listings. 
✔️Also shows product images in search results! Making it easier to shortlist product.

How to Use
1.First open Amazon US website(https://www.amazon.com/). Keep it logged in to search and shop seamlessly directly from chrome omni box(searchbox).
2. Now you can click extension icon to launch Amazon product search or use omnibox and type "amz" enter tab key and type to search the product of your choice.
3. When you find the product you were looking for just click the link.
4. If you are already logged into Amzon website you will be able to add the product to cart, else you will be asked to log in.
5. Enjoy Shopping on Amazon!.

Please note that this extension can only be used to search products on Amazon US website. To provide this functionality extension takes over your default search for seamless experience.
